derivation: middle voice from G1909 (ἐπιλαμβάνομαι) and G2983 (ἐπιλαμβάνομαι);
kjv_def: catch, lay hold (up-)on, take (by, hold of, on)
strongs_def: to seize (for help, injury, attainment, or any other purpose; literally or figuratively)
outline:
1. to take in addition, to lay hold of, take possession of, overtake, attain, attain to
    1. to lay hold of or to seize upon anything with the hands, to take hold of, lay hold of
    2. metaph. to rescue one from peril, to help, succour
